Sql.query: SELECT DISTINCT BAR.barrCodi ,BAR.barrNombre FROM( SELECT BARRCODI FROM trn_costo_marginal WHERE PERICODI=:pericodi AND COSMARVERSION=:version AND COSMARDIA BETWEEN {0} AND {1} UNION SELECT BARRCODI FROM TRN_COSTO_MARGINAL_CONGENE WHERE PERICODI=:pericodi AND CONGENEVERSION=:version AND CONGENEDIA BETWEEN {0} AND {1} ) TBL INNER JOIN trn_barra BAR ON TBL.BARRCODI=BAR.BARRCODI ORDER BY BAR.barrNombre ASC

SELECT DISTINCT BAR.barrCodi ,BAR.barrNombre FROM( SELECT CMG.BARRCODI FROM trn_costo_marginal CMG INNER JOIN TRN_PERIODO PER ON CMG.PERICODI=PER.PERICODI WHERE per.PERIANIO BETWEEN {0} AND {3} AND per.PERIMES BETWEEN {1} AND {4} AND CMG.COSMARDIA BETWEEN {2} AND {5} UNION SELECT cmg.barrcodi FROM TRN_COSTO_MARGINAL_CONGENE CMG INNER JOIN TRN_PERIODO PER ON CMG.PERICODI=PER.PERICODI WHERE per.PERIANIO BETWEEN {0} AND {3} AND per.PERIMES BETWEEN {1} AND {4} AND CMG.CONGENEDIA BETWEEN {2} AND {5} )tbl INNER JOIN trn_barra BAR ON TBL.BARRCODI=BAR.BARRCODI ORDER BY BAR.barrNombre ASC

SELECT DISTINCT BAR.barrCodi ,BAR.barrNombre FROM( SELECT CMG.BARRCODI FROM trn_costo_marginal CMG INNER JOIN TRN_PERIODO PER ON CMG.PERICODI=PER.PERICODI WHERE per.pericodi between {0} and {1} UNION SELECT cmg.barrcodi FROM TRN_COSTO_MARGINAL_CONGENE CMG INNER JOIN TRN_PERIODO PER ON CMG.PERICODI=PER.PERICODI WHERE per.pericodi between {0} and {1} )tbl INNER JOIN trn_barra BAR ON TBL.BARRCODI=BAR.BARRCODI ORDER BY BAR.barrNombre ASC

SELECT barrcodi ,TO_CHAR(CMGRFECHA,'dd/mm/yyyy')||'_'||cmgrcorrelativo FechaColumna ,CMGRTOTAL FROM si_costomarginal WHERE BARRCODI in({0}) AND CMGRFECHA between to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('{2} 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY CMGRFECHA ASC
SELECT * FROM trn_costo_marginal WHERE PERICODI=:pericodi AND COSMARVERSION=:version AND BARRCODI in({0}) AND COSMARDIA BETWEEN {1} AND {2} ORDER BY COSMARDIA

SELECT barrcodi ,TO_CHAR(CMGRFECHA,'dd/mm/yyyy')||'_'||cmgrcorrelativo FechaColumna ,CMGRCONGESTION FROM si_costomarginal WHERE BARRCODI in({0}) AND CMGRFECHA between to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('{2} 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY CMGRFECHA ASC
SELECT * FROM trn_costo_marginal_congene WHERE PERICODI=:pericodi AND CONGENEVERSION=:version AND BARRCODI in({0}) AND CONGENEDIA BETWEEN {1} AND {2} AND TIPCOSTO=:tipcosto ORDER BY CONGENEDIA

SELECT barrcodi ,TO_CHAR(CMGRFECHA,'dd/mm/yyyy')||'_'||cmgrcorrelativo FechaColumna ,CMGRENERGIA FROM si_costomarginal WHERE BARRCODI in({0}) AND CMGRFECHA between to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('{2} 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY CMGRFECHA ASC

SELECT * FROM( SELECT 1, SUM(cosmar1),SUM(cosmar3),SUM(cosmar5),SUM(cosmar7),SUM(cosmar9), SUM(cosmar11),SUM(cosmar13),SUM(cosmar15),SUM(cosmar17),SUM(cosmar19), SUM(cosmar21),SUM(cosmar23),SUM(cosmar25),SUM(cosmar27),SUM(cosmar29), SUM(cosmar31),SUM(cosmar33),SUM(cosmar35),SUM(cosmar37),SUM(cosmar39), SUM( cosmar41),SUM(cosmar43),SUM(cosmar45),SUM(cosmar47),SUM(cosmar49), SUM(cosmar51),SUM(cosmar53),SUM(cosmar55),SUM(cosmar57),SUM(cosmar59), SUM(cosmar61),SUM(cosmar63),SUM(cosmar65),SUM(cosmar67),SUM(cosmar69), SUM(cosmar71),SUM(cosmar73),SUM(cosmar75),SUM(cosmar77),SUM(cosmar79), SUM( cosmar81),SUM(cosmar83),SUM(cosmar85),SUM(cosmar87),SUM(cosmar89), SUM(cosmar91),SUM(cosmar93),SUM(cosmar95) FROM trn_costo_marginal WHERE PERICODI = {0} AND COSMARVERSION in({1}) AND BARRCODI in({2}) AND COSMARDIA IN({3}) UNION SELECT 2, SUM(cosmar1),SUM(cosmar3),SUM(cosmar5),SUM(cosmar7),SUM(cosmar9), SUM(cosmar11),SUM(cosmar13),SUM(cosmar15),SUM(cosmar17),SUM(cosmar19), SUM(cosmar21),SUM(cosmar23),SUM(cosmar25),SUM(cosmar27),SUM(cosmar29), SUM(cosmar31),SUM(cosmar33),SUM(cosmar35),SUM(cosmar37),SUM(cosmar39), SUM( cosmar41),SUM(cosmar43),SUM(cosmar45),SUM(cosmar47),SUM(cosmar49), SUM(cosmar51),SUM(cosmar53),SUM(cosmar55),SUM(cosmar57),SUM(cosmar59), SUM(cosmar61),SUM(cosmar63),SUM(cosmar65),SUM(cosmar67),SUM(cosmar69), SUM(cosmar71),SUM(cosmar73),SUM(cosmar75),SUM(cosmar77),SUM(cosmar79), SUM( cosmar81),SUM(cosmar83),SUM(cosmar85),SUM(cosmar87),SUM(cosmar89), SUM(cosmar91),SUM(cosmar93),SUM(cosmar95) FROM trn_costo_marginal WHERE PERICODI = {4} AND COSMARVERSION in({5}) AND BARRCODI in({6}) AND COSMARDIA IN({7}) ) TBL

SELECT * FROM( SELECT 1, SUM(congene1),SUM(congene2),SUM(congene3),SUM(congene4),SUM(congene5), SUM(congene6),SUM(congene7),SUM(congene8),SUM(congene9),SUM(congene10), SUM(congene11),SUM(congene12),SUM(congene13),SUM(congene14),SUM(congene15), SUM( congene16),SUM(congene17),SUM(congene18),SUM(congene19),SUM(congene20), SUM(congene21),SUM(congene22),SUM(congene23),SUM(congene24),SUM(congene25), SUM(congene26),SUM(congene27),SUM(congene28),SUM(congene29),SUM(congene30), SUM(congene31),SUM(congene32),SUM(congene33),SUM(congene34),SUM(congene35), SUM(congene36),SUM(congene37),SUM(congene38),SUM(congene39),SUM(congene40), SUM(congene41),SUM(congene42),SUM(congene43),SUM(congene44),SUM(congene45), SUM(congene46),SUM(congene47),SUM(congene48) FROM trn_costo_marginal_congene WHERE PERICODI = {0} AND congeneVERSION in({1}) AND BARRCODI in({2}) AND congeneDIA IN({3}) AND tipCosto=:tipCosto UNION SELECT 2, SUM(congene1),SUM(congene2),SUM(congene3),SUM(congene4),SUM(congene5), SUM(congene6),SUM(congene7),SUM(congene8),SUM(congene9),SUM(congene10), SUM(congene11),SUM(congene12),SUM(congene13),SUM(congene14),SUM(congene15), SUM( congene16),SUM(congene17),SUM(congene18),SUM(congene19),SUM(congene20), SUM(congene21),SUM(congene22),SUM(congene23),SUM(congene24),SUM(congene25), SUM(congene26),SUM(congene27),SUM(congene28),SUM(congene29),SUM(congene30), SUM(congene31),SUM(congene32),SUM(congene33),SUM(congene34),SUM(congene35), SUM(congene36),SUM(congene37),SUM(congene38),SUM(congene39),SUM(congene40), SUM(congene41),SUM(congene42),SUM(congene43),SUM(congene44),SUM(congene45), SUM(congene46),SUM(congene47),SUM(congene48) FROM trn_costo_marginal_congene WHERE PERICODI = {4} AND congeneVERSION in({5}) AND BARRCODI in({6}) AND congeneDIA IN({7}) AND tipCosto=:tipCosto ) TBL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE(per.PERIANIO||'-'||PER.PERIMES||'-'||CMG.COSMARDIA,'YYYY-MM-DD') CMGRFECHA ,COSMARPROMEDIODIA ,BARRCODI FROM trn_costo_marginal CMG INNER JOIN TRN_PERIODO PER ON CMG.PERICODI=PER.PERICODI WHERE BARRCODI in({0}) -- NO ES RECOMEN AND COSMARVERSION IN ( SELECT max(cosmarversion) FROM trn_costo_marginal CIN WHERE CIN.PERICODI=CMG.PERICODI) )TBL WHERE CMGRFECHA between to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('{2} 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY CMGRFECHA

SELECT TO_DATE(per.PERIANIO||'-'||PER.PERIMES||'-'||1,'YYYY-MM-DD') CMGRFECHA ,BARRCODI , TO_CHAR(AVG(cosmarpromediodia),'fm99999999.999999999') cosmarpromedio FROM trn_costo_marginal CMG INNER JOIN TRN_PERIODO PER ON CMG.PERICODI=PER.PERICODI WHERE BARRCODI in({0}) AND COSMARVERSION IN ( SELECT max(cosmarversion) FROM trn_costo_marginal CIN WHERE CIN.PERICODI=CMG.PERICODI) AND CMG.PERICODI BETWEEN {1} AND {2} GROUP BY TO_DATE(per.PERIANIO||'-'||PER.PERIMES||'-'||1,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,BARRCODI ORDER BY CMGRFECHA

SELECT TO_DATE(per.PERIANIO||'-'||PER.PERIMES||'-'||1,'YYYY-MM-DD') CMGRFECHA ,BARRCODI ,TO_CHAR(AVG(congenepromedio),'fm99999999.999999999') cosmarpromedio FROM TRN_COSTO_MARGINAL_CONGENE CMG INNER JOIN TRN_PERIODO PER ON CMG.PERICODI=PER.PERICODI WHERE BARRCODI in({0}) AND congeneVERSION IN ( SELECT max(congeneversion) FROM TRN_COSTO_MARGINAL_CONGENE CIN WHERE CIN.PERICODI=CMG.PERICODI) AND CMG.PERICODI BETWEEN {1} AND {2} AND CMG.TIPCOSTO={3} GROUP BY TO_DATE(per.PERIANIO||'-'||PER.PERIMES||'-'||1,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,BARRCODI ORDER BY CMGRFECHA

SELECT TO_DATE(per.PERIANIO||'-'||PER.PERIMES||'-'||CMG.CONGENEDIA,'YYYY-MM-DD') CMGRFECHA ,BARRCODI ,congenepromedio cosmarpromedio FROM TRN_COSTO_MARGINAL_CONGENE CMG INNER JOIN TRN_PERIODO PER ON CMG.PERICODI=PER.PERICODI WHERE BARRCODI in({0}) AND congeneVERSION IN ( SELECT max(congeneversion) FROM TRN_COSTO_MARGINAL_CONGENE CIN WHERE CIN.PERICODI=CMG.PERICODI) AND TO_DATE(per.PERIANIO||'-'||PER.PERIMES||'-'||CMG.CONGENEDIA,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('{2} 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND CMG.TIPCOSTO={3}
ORDER BY CMGRFECHA
SELECT barrcodi ,barrNombre FROM trn_barra WHERE BARRCODI in({0}) ORDER BY BARRNOMBRE ASC
SELECT barrcodi ,barrNombre FROM trn_barra WHERE BARRCODI in({0}) ORDER BY BARRNOMBRE ASC
